<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Retrieve Stellar Info File"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/.well-known/stellar.toml"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Allows the wallet to fetch the SEP-10 server url, SEP-10 signing public key and SEP-24 server url.
